Plot: Nikolai (played by Sergei Dontsov) has been fired from his job as a music teacher and has to live in the gym until he finds a place to stay. Finally, he gets a communal room in the ...
Title: Window to Paris
Writer: Vyacheslav Leykin (additional writing), Yuri Mamin, Guy Séligmann (adaptation), Arkadiy Tigay, Vladimir Vardunas
Actors: Agnès Soral, Sergey Dreyden, Viktor Mikhaylov, Nina Usatova
